creator: OlafvdSpek@GMail.Com
text:
I installed Apache 2.0.47 on Windows 98. The conf includes:
LogLevel warn
The error log includes:
[Fri Oct 10 13:02:17 2003] [notice] Parent: Created child process -327251

But according to http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/core.html#loglevel
only warn, error, crit, alert and emerg level messages should be present in the 
log file.

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text: This is now fixed in all three doc trees. Thanks.
